FOOD: Crack conch with peas and rice

Casado Chifrijo (chicharrón or deep fried seasoned pork pieces) served with beans usually red or black beans (frijoles in spanish there comes the name Chifrijo; CHI from Chicharrón and FRIJO from frijoles) white rice and pico de gallo. Optionally it may be served with avocado and/or corn chips Gallo Pinto
Vepřo-knedlo-zelo (Roast pork with dumplings and sauerkraut)

Due to its diverse culture India does not have a specific national dish. There were rumours that the government of India was planning on designating khichdi as a national dish but it was later denied by the government.
There is no officially designated food but various authors have named dishes such as apple pie
